Postdoctoral theoretical physics researcher specialized in atomic physics with a passion for quantum mechanics, outreach, social entrepeneurship and open source projects.

I am highly skilled in both theoretical and numerical calculations.
My fields of interest are foundations of quantum mechanics, AMO physics, quantum information and thermodynamics. 

I have plenty of experience working with teams, both as a leader and as a proactive member.
